name: VR Luxury Life (Be a Billionaire)
description: Wanna a billionaire life? You don't need to be wealthy in reality, you can just spend a few dollars on this virtual reality game and you will know how it would like. You will have a helicopter, a garden, a grand villa (in which you can interact with furnitures), a swimming pool, a lot of maids, an endless California manor that you have to visit in a hot air balloon as it is too big, a hunting ground in Southeast Asia where you hunt for fun, and a nightclub where beauties are dancing. These are your properties in VR! And of course, you will have to exercise while hunting and balloon flying.
